website_summaries.verdict: Extremely hard-wearing kids' rain boots that are suitable for wet and icy conditions.
pros: Parents are pleased with the excellent grip that holds up in slippery conditions
Neoprene lining is temperature rated to 0°F
High cutoff point to reduce splashes
Come in a range of colors and patterns
cons: More expensive than an average rain boot

customer_reviews.title: High wear in short time, Oaki has gone down in quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been wearing these for just over 2 months and they have worn on the heels causing leaking. Her feet are soaked and freezing after coming home from school. The last pair like these that she grew out of lasted over a year and passed on to a friend to use so I’m very disappointed in this loss of quality. I’ve contacted Oaki seller to see if they will exchange or refund and await their response. I will update this review if/when I hear back. Willing to try another pair but based on other reviews I think these might be a lost cause and I will be purchasing another brand for my kids from now on :(
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Ok but will not be purchasing again
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my very active 5 year old. We live on a hobby farm out in the country where the kids spend lots of time outside in mud, rain, snow and in with their animals. I was looking for a brand that was durable but reasonably priced. We bought them for Christmas and honestly, within 30 days, I'm noticing a lot of wear on the sole. We are losing the grips in some spots and by that, I mean they are wearing off. I think I'm going to have to bite the bullet, as they say, and pay for some Muck Boot Company boots because these are NOT going to last until spring.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Warm in the cold New England winter's!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these boots 3x now and loved every pair. They hold up great, have awesome traction, and are super warm even though they feel so thin. Both my littles can get them on and off independently. I will say though that they do run an entire size too large. My daughter is a size 7 toddler in Plae and needed a 6 in these and my son is a 1 and the 1s in these were falling off. We double up in socks and he can sort of get away with it but knowing what I know now I always buy a full-size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Love

customer_reviews.title: BEST boots I've found for my rough & tough child!! On our 2nd pair & counting!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying, we live on a ranch. I needed something for my kiddo that was extremely durable, had grip to it, flexible and waterproof. It has withstood 2 solid years (Springs, Summers, Falls and Winters) of nearly every day use, in mud, muck, water and snow. With barely a wear or tear on them. I'm now back a couple years later and have purchased another larger pair, as shes now grown out of the other ones. GREAT quality, nice grip on the soles, definetly waterproof and durable, as well as comfortable. I will most definetly continue to buy boots from this company in the future years.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for boots that could be used for winter and spring. Snow and rain in one. These are the ones! They are comparable to more exspensive brands. They also arrived a week early! I am excited to see how durable they are through winter. Sl far they have been worn in rain, snow and every mud puddle she can find. No leaks and her feet are warm but not too hot! I WILL be purchasing them again when she grows out of her current boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kasondra Ham

customer_reviews.title: A little large, but I knew that going in
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd pair of boots, only because my son outgrew the first set. The first set lasted us a year and are still in working condition, so they will be passed on. No leaks, durable, perfect for the mucky environment we live in, especially during our rainy season. My son loves these, and I love that I don't have to deal with wet socks, wet feet, or dirty pants bottoms that take a while to scrub clean. They are a bit pricey, but since they last so long, I don't mind paying the price. Very happy with our purchase, and I'm sure, as he grows, we will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: LFC8

customer_reviews.title: Runs huge !
customer_reviews.text: These boots are super cute but run huuuge! My son wears a size 5.5 in sneakers so i got him a 6. Thinking they would be perfect for this winter(my son is 15 months old). I recieved the boots today and they are about 2 sizes to big! I seriously doubt he will fit into these this winter... Debating on sending back and exchanging for a 5. We live in maine and boots are needed almost year round. But unless he goes through a serious growth spirt they wont fit for this winter. im a little disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Desmond

customer_reviews.title: Will always buy these
customer_reviews.text: I am so please with these boots. I have twin 6 year old boys, I bought one twin these boots and then they were sold out so I bought a different brand for my other twin. After the other brand crapped out I was able to buy another pair of these for him. The first pair are still going strong. Look great and still holding up. We live on a farm, get lots of snow, and my boys are HARD on shoes, a year later and still going strong! I do recommend ordering a size up. Well worth the price, get them fast bc they always sell out!
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great boots good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice boots. Good quality. Got these for a Christmas gift for our 7 year old. We live on a farm and he loves to play in mud ! After so many shoes had to go in the trash I decided to get a good pair of boots and glad I decided on this brand. Great quality, made durable. I also like that they can be rolled down when you don’t need tall boots. I was so surprised when they actually arrived before Christmas since it stated they wouldn’t be here until after the new year. Would recommend buying and plan on buying them again and getting a pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty looking
customer_reviews.text: We just got these and so far my son loves the fit and comfort. I just wish they looked a little better. The edges around the rubber look stained, I'm guessing it's the glue showing through but I wish they found a better looking way to do it. I know they will get dirty anyway, so we'll keep them, but when you spend this much on brand new you want them to come that way.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Perusse

customer_reviews.title: HUGE SHOES chart is wrong for measuring
customer_reviews.text: The boots are good qualify but the size is completely wrong for the measurement chart they tell you to use- my son should have been able to fit a 13t and I had do order a size 11 and hopefully they fit- but I am guessing here because the chart is wrong - not thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, functional and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Boots were for my daughter, now that my 6 year old had size 1s sometimes for feet. It is incredibly difficult to find boots like this. Then she started adding she wanted blue, and designs on it. These saved me a headache. They fit well, are sturdy, they pull up higher than her last pair, and given how wet the snow is this year... that's a win for me too. The design is also really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Tzigane Pope

customer_reviews.title: Not as clunky as Bogs, smaller sizes & fit more true to size
customer_reviews.text: Not as clunky as Bogs, these fit more true to size. The fit of these boots still provides room for heavy socks for those cold/wet/snow days. Unlike Bogs where the boot fits 1-2+ sizes large, with the smallest a size 7 (UK?), these Oaki provide more size ranges and more TTS. My child wears a size 6-7US and is wearing the size 6 OAKI with some extra room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy sturdy year round boots
customer_reviews.text: When we moved to New England I wasn't sure how many snow days we would actually get (this year, seven) so this was an experiment in not buying snow boots without knowing what winter was really like... if turned out you can have your snow boots and rain boots too! Snow boots when paired with thick wool socks, rain (puddles, stream etc) boots on other days. Waterproof and indestructible apparently, and the handles come in handy when you are four and your brothers are already out of the door!
customer_reviews.author: Benedicte_Gbury

customer_reviews.title: have good traction and the print is super cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these dinosaur boots! I bought them large so they will last this winter and with a thick pair of wool socks, her feet stay dry and toasty. They appear very well made, have good traction and the print is super cute! I would absolutely recommend these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen T.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.text: To think I almost spent 70 bucks on Sperry's for my 2.5 year old for winter and fall. I came across these and they are the cutest boots ever. They are so well made and the owl design does not disappoint. They are perfect for rain/snow/sleet/ and all of the above. I love that you can pull these on with the handle holes on the side of the boot. These give enough room to wear thick wool socks for cold times. So glad I bought these! Will recommend these to friends!
customer_reviews.author: Aubsmommmy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We got these as a replacement after we lost my son's very expensive Bogs. We live on a ranch in WY and the snow/mud can be extreme. I was happy with the quality and fit and he loves to put them on by himself and play outside. Sometimes he wants to wear these even on sunny, dry days. Good boot.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Dacar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little boys!! Sturdy & easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My 3YO LOVES these boots. He is very rough on shoes and they’ve held up to all of the rock kicking, puddle jumping, frog chasing kind of things that little boys do. They rinse off and stay nice looking for all he puts them through. I was concerned they would be too heavy for him but he hasn’t complained. I hope these are still available when he outgrows this pair!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Devereaux

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: These are such great boots. We've been buying Bogs every year since my kids could walk. These are comparable quality wise (though Bogs has a better warranty) at half the price. They stay waterproof through deep puddles and mud. And warm enough for our cold Michigan winters. Since my kids outgrow them so quickly, they are worth purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Karah127

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So they have the appearance of being well made, I will have to give them over to my 5 y/o and we shall see... they are sized big. I bought another set of different boots a size up for my daughter and both pair from the outside look to be about the same size. Nothing a couple of pairs of socks won’t fix, but I would have preferred to know when I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Scott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boot for little ones!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for both of my grandsons, 18 & 20 months, for Christmas. They were such a hit!! Both of them wear them all the time - even with their pajamas!! They’re made very well. I feel that they will outgrow them long before they are worn out. I’m very impressed. They are so much nicer than the rubber rain boots that I always bought my own kids.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Best kids boot yet!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing! My daughter goes to a nature preschool in Montana. Last year we spent the money on Bogg boots. This year we got Oaki because we have been so happy with the rain suit. It’s only October but we have already been below zero with heavy snow. She has stayed warm and dry. Even better she is very fussy about clothing and shoes feeling comfortable. These boots are a hit she wants to wear them everyday. Definitely will purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: As a mother to six active children, I am always looking for products that can stand the test of time. These boots fit that need perfectly! We have been loyal oakiwear customers for several years and have been very happy with every product. We have purchased several different pairs of these neoprene boots and have been happy with every purchase. They are sized larger than normal to allow for extra insulation. These boots are well made, durable, and have lasted through several children. They are warm enough for cool weather, totally waterproof, and make great snow boots with extra warm socks. Will continue to buy these products!
customer_reviews.author: ARD

customer_reviews.title: Should have had a better size chart.
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 7 for my kid, who wears size 7 US/23 EU. These turn out to be 25 EU. That's is two sizes too large. And they charge for return/exchange fee.
customer_reviews.author: Viet Anh to

customer_reviews.title: Great kids boots great price
customer_reviews.text: We bought one size bigger for her to grow cause kiddos grow fast as we all know. We live in the snow and we a good pair of socks keeps her toes warm and she loves them. She can put them on her self and they have good enough traction for a kids boot. And the price is half of what the main brands. But great boot great price anymore that 40 bucks and we wouldn’t have bought them so Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so cute and my daughter has gotten many complements from other kids and mothers. She has been wearing them for about a month now and no signs of wear so far! They are taller than her last neoprene boots which will be helpful in the snow (she was always getting snow in the top of her old boots!).
customer_reviews.author: T. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Overall- Love them! On one hand, this design allows my 2 year old to put on her own shoes and feel independent. On the other hand, these giant holes in the sides are vulnerable to water.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Daughter wears them daily
customer_reviews.text: We have a small farm and needed something nicer than cheap rain boots for my daughter but also weren't willing to spend a ton of money on "good" boots she'd just outgrow in a couple months. These have held up nicely through the mud and muck, and my daughter reports that they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will be pleased with these boots.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these boots. I bought them a size to big so she can use them next year. If you have a son or daughter who needs a good pair of rain boots..... STOP LOOKING! You found them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Honsvick

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: The boots are very cute and look well made. I’m so disappointed by the sizing. I’ve tried the 4 and 5 for my 14 month old and both have been huge! I really wanted these to work. Bummed
customer_reviews.author: nic

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my grandson when he plays in the mud at my house. They work great and he says they are very comfortable! I love the help me handle, I don't have to always help him put them on :)
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: We've had 4 pairs of these over the years now, and they have been great for our kids. Some heavy socks, and they work well in the snow. We've never had a problem with the waterproofing, and they are easy for kids to put on by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Linnes-bagley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and she loves them. I haven't used them for winter yet but she has used them as rain boots and they work great. I read a few reviews saying this boots ran a bit on the larger side but they fit my daughter just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin

customer_reviews.title: great boot
customer_reviews.text: Size is right on. Boot is great quality. Rubber bottom with upper neoprene material. My daughter loves them. We haven't tried them out yet at the farm but plan to soon. She wears wool/thick socks with hers and they are perfect! Bought size 3. She wears a size 2.5 in tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: LCW

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the expensive brand!
customer_reviews.text: We are a BOG family, but I'm having a hard time paying $$ for kids' boots since they only last 2 years at best! I decided to try these boots for my daughter and they are great! They are heavier, like the insulated version of BOGS, and SO cute! I'd buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: J. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, using for the snow in MI.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am liking these boots for my 2 year old. I bought an 8. I also compared them to a big boot, and they are the same size as a size 9 big boot. Quality seems good so far, and his feet didn't get wet while playing in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality boot but slippery
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and he loves them. They are a heavy quality boot. The only drawback is they are slippery on a slick wet surface. My son fell on the first day of wearing these on a wet floor in a restaurant. Despite the traction on these boots they are slippery
customer_reviews.author: YellowstoneGal

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: We love these boots for our wet fall walks to school. A bit heavy for a lot of play but I’m happy we purchased them..
customer_reviews.author: glutenfreemom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots, very well made and would definitely buy ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots, very well made and would definitely buy them again. The only thing is that I bought the size my grandson currently wears and these are so big they fall off his feet - but in all honesty, I did not look at a size chart. I am about to buy these again, just two sizes smaller. Am keeping the pair I currently have for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ready for the Eclipse!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute & durable. My granddaughter loves them. Worth the $$. Bought for 3 grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased multiple Oaki boots for our sons. They use them constantly when playing outside. They are easy to clean and comfortable for the kids legs and feet. Previous pairs have been very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Enlund

customer_reviews.title: The best rain boots
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and only wears this brand of rain boots! His little brothers have gotten the ones he grew out of and they hold up great!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: They run big
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boots, I will have update on how they wear over time. They do run quite large, I measured his foot and used the size chart and they are still big. The insole is also super thin and doesn't stay in place, but overall I think these will be great for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Jolee Slaven

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice boots they were too large but it had free returns and I ordered a smaller pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spots on one boot
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Bought as a gift for my 7 year old nephew. Gave it 3 stars because one of the boots has weird marks on it, I think some type of sealer they applied to them and it ran- refer to photo
customer_reviews.author: EMMom

customer_reviews.title: Faded and scuffed up
customer_reviews.text: They run big , my boots arrived faded and looked scuffed up As if they were old , I would not recommend them to anyone. Bummed out 😞
customer_reviews.author: TrishaMorris88

customer_reviews.title: Puddle stompers!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are perfect! Even though I got a size too big my son wears them religiously and can run / jump / play with no problems! They slip on and off and the handles at the top make for easy carrying. The handles are prob my fav part of these boots, cuz when they get dirty you don’t really wanna touch them! They clean nicely and are super durable and highly recommended for a five year old!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Butch

customer_reviews.title: Quality rain/snow boots
customer_reviews.text: These are great little waterproof boots for younger kids. Got for my 3 1/2 yr grandson and he can slip them on and take them off himself. As they run large,they are hard to walk in for extended periods and do tend to slip off his feet when riding in his car seat or in shopping cart. That said, they keep his feet warm and dry in the rain and snow. MUCH cheaper than Boggs and made as well!! Will buy again when he outgrows these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GO 1 SIZE DOWN NOT 2 SIZE DOWN.
customer_reviews.text: According to reviews previous buyers said to go down 2 size. my son wears a 12 and unfortunately it was too tight on because we bought it to play in the snow meaning thicker socks. So we had to return it and get a size 11 and that was perfect for my son! Even with thicker socks it wasnt too big nor too small/tight.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Peters

customer_reviews.title: Good kids boot
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 6 year old son for hunting. Weather hasn’t been real cold yet but he says their comfortable and made his feet hot. It was only 40 degrees out. I expect these will do the job and be a good boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, my child loves them! I will buy this brand again as she grows!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great advise form Oakiwear in fit
customer_reviews.text: I followed the recommendations on sizing from Oakiwear. For example they indicated if your child wore size 12 for these boots order size 11. Since I wanted room to grow and get through the winter I ordered the size he was wearing now. Boots were perfect with just enough growth space, but stayed on his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is way off.
customer_reviews.text: Second time returning these. First size too big (big kid 2). Second ones too small (13). Can't figure out why the 13s don't fit, measured his feet and they should be roomy. If the 1s dont fit I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan B.

customer_reviews.title: Forget name brands!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2 year old perfectly. Her little foot slid right into them. I almost got Bogs but these are just as good and i couldn't ask for a better product for the price and quality! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: They run a little bit large, but that's perfect for growing kids. My daughter loves them! We live in the mountains and winters are typically pretty cold here, the boots are holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: mntngrl

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These are really durable and long lasting. My son wore them daily! No cracks or leaks after one year of playing in dirt and mud regularly. Easy on and off.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Feels good. bad quality
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves these boots but after less than a month the heels are already failing. They are waterproof for now but at the rate they are falling apart I doubt it will be for long.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Great boot but runs a little big
customer_reviews.text: Great boot! Keeps feet dry and warm for running errands or walks.you could try for plying in snow but not tons of insulation. I used the kamik snow boots for that. Does run big. Wears a 9 in tennis shoes and got a 9 in the boot. Plenty of room for next year but works well for this year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: couldn’t be happier with these boots. I ordered them last fall and used them all winter and now spring. My son loves them, they keep water out, easy to clean and super cute. Plus we get compliments every time I post a picture or we go out! Highly recommend these, I will order another pair next year!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Easy on! love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I have two year old twins and a four year old. I had other boots without handles and it took forever and a ton of frustration to get everyone out the door. These boots are fantastic--my two year olds can put them on themselves and if they decide that they're not in the right mood to put them on themselves--I can wrangle them on no problem. Great fit, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: margaret O'sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Dry
customer_reviews.text: We tested these out in the cold AND rain with no socks and they stayed warm and dry! My 2yo son loves them espcially since he’s obsessed with Peppa Pig and wants to go jumping in muddy puddles.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani T

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and perfect for school aged kids.
customer_reviews.text: Today Oct. 10th was our first snow storm. My daughter wore her snow boots for the first time today during recess. She said he feet felt warm and dry. I am very happy with the price point, fit, style, and overall product. Thank you for offering an affordable product.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Much better quality/built than ones I have bought at local sports stores in past that last less than a season. And my 7 yr old daughter loves them! Will buy again. However, I wish they made larger sizes in their boy boots that would fit my 9 yr old son...
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Best Kids Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are AWESOME for kids. No lining to fuss with, comfortable, easy pull on handles, water proof, and a cool design. These are our second pair since we outgrew the first.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots, waterproof and warm, we hunt and fish a lot, these keep my 3 year old daughters feet warm, it’s hard to find warm vs cute and these are both!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Szanto

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, just re-bought again!
customer_reviews.text: Just love these boots. We live in “the sticks,” there’s always puddles, snow, mud, muck ect these hold up well for the abuse they get! They run a bit big so we get 1.5-2 yrs out of them per kiddo which is a lot considering the kids were them hard 10 months out of a year!
customer_reviews.author: Becks

customer_reviews.title: Toddler  approved
customer_reviews.text: My toddler LOVES these boots. They fit well, are comfortable, and keep her feet dry and warm while she is outside playing in the puddles, Snow, and mud!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Best boot ever
customer_reviews.text: 3 season boots- 3rd pair of these, my son LOVES them. Great for snow, super warm, mud, and rain puddles. Easy quick slip on.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend them
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Really cute. Seem warm. My 2yr old stomps in puddles. He runs in the mud. He puts these boots to the test! He can also put them on because of the pulls!
customer_reviews.author: S. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Alaska Tough!
customer_reviews.text: These boots seem perfect for my toddler girls. The neoprene is warm and insulating. The pattern and design are cute. Had a minor mishap. Ordered 8T shoes and The bag was labeled 8t shoes but were a 6t. Honest mistake, called customer service on invoice, they checked inventory, made an alternative selection and they shipped out priority mail that same day. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Fits, protects, and durable in same manner as much more expensive competitor. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cook

customer_reviews.title: Too tall for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 4T size for my toddler. They were cute but came up above her knees. She couldn’t walk in these at all. They might work if you have a super tall kiddo. Mine is in the 35-40 percentile for height. Sent back. Getting bogs instead.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Great boots.
customer_reviews.text: The kids love them! I love them. Easy on and off, cute, well made. When they’ve all grown out of them they’ll will be great hand-me downs and I’ll buy more!
customer_reviews.author: pmal

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small and narrow, but otherwise awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love the horses because my daughter uses them at our barn around horses..
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! Easy to fit and we live in Alaska.... the weather can get cold.... she can wear this outside during recess. Perfect for her!
customer_reviews.author: Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty tight in the calves but great boots
customer_reviews.text: My son has chunky little calves so few boots will tuck into them. Other than that the boots are pretty great. They have a grest tread that is holding up to his bike riding!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All Season Boots!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second pair! Love these boots. I like the width of the opening- narrow, which fit my LO’s legs with just an inch or so of room. Fun patterns. Great for the outdoors! Good for all seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots for my son. They do run big. He is a size 10 normally and those were huge on him. We kept them for next year and ordered a 9 and they fit perfect with even a little room. So worth the money. I’ll never go back to the cheap rubber ones again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty but bad smell
customer_reviews.text: We like this boot but the chemical smell initially was awful. Also the footbed keeps coming out when my son takes his boots off which gets him really frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Aislinn E.

customer_reviews.title: these boots are much better quality than the foam style ones he ripped pulling
customer_reviews.text: Even though a little large, these boots are much better quality than the foam style ones he ripped pulling on
customer_reviews.author: SEP

customer_reviews.title: Great kids boot
customer_reviews.text: These are our second pair for our 3 year old son and they are great! He can easily take them on and off on his own, they are comfortable for him and they keep his feet dry so it’s a win all the way around!
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My 20month old grandson loves trucks so he loves his boots. Also he can almost put them on himself. Love the boots
customer_reviews.author: Barb G

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The rubber is way better quality than the $15 rain boots I've been purchasing for my son. His other boots split open every couple of months but I forsee these lasting a lot longer. I will update this review if they split open.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute boots
customer_reviews.text: the boots are really cute and my grandson loved them.
customer_reviews.author: E. Koch

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair different size my son loves them. Had to get thr next size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit large, but a great boot for rain and cold!
customer_reviews.text: this fit a little big, but are wonderful otherwise. Waterproof and easy to put on and off for my 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Bhatti

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bogs
customer_reviews.text: I did have to exchange for a smaller size but once we were able to use these boots, I fell in love. My son wore them daily in the mud and muck for 1 winter/spring season and with a simple hose down they look almost new. With these boots and the Oakiwear suit my son can play outside in any weather! We just ordered our second pair of boots a few sizes larger!
customer_reviews.author: RRTC

customer_reviews.title: These boots are cute but little big to size
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots but they are a little big to size!!
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Cute boot
customer_reviews.text: Cute boot over all but I'm dissapointed that it wasn't the bright fun yellow color as pictured. It's more of a light yellow color. Either way my kid will still have a blast in them while playing in the mud with his trucks.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Johnson-Easterwood

customer_reviews.title: Size down 2 sizes!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a 4.5-5 toddler and these were huge on her. Got them in the size 4 for toddler. On the good these are amazing quality and we are now waiting for the day when she grows into them!
customer_reviews.author: Carina Serrano

customer_reviews.title: This are very good quality boots for the price
customer_reviews.text: This are very good quality boots for the price, but they do run big! My daughter wears a 10 shoe and I got a 9 in these and she still has room to grow! Compared to bogs, these are the way to go at the fraction of the price! Will buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: Little firefighter perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my little firefighter! Comfy and easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Redseason

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy these boots for my 6 year old daughter who like to play in rain puddles and mud. It is easy for her to take off and on when she is at school and at home. It fits her perfectly and it is the boot that she gravitates too knowing that it is easy for her to take on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Downey

customer_reviews.title: Great boot.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves these for playing in mud. Super fast shipping. Very please with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boot
customer_reviews.text: Quality boot!! Will buy again and again This is my second pair for my son (out grew the first) just as good as more pricey versions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is fine to have them large for older kids but not ...
customer_reviews.text: It is fine to have them large for older kids but not for a 2 year old. But the are very well made and cute. I am retuning them to get muck boots for my grandaughter who love to climb and water in stream and play in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Rain/snow boots
customer_reviews.text: warm and water proof. they fit into my sons snow pants and hes comfortable in them. hes wore them everyday at school while playing in the snow and they've been warm enough.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Cold Wisconsin weather at -7 we walked on a frozen lake, stomped through 6 inches of powder on our way up the sledding hill. They will come with us to the winter beach. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anne  Kocurek

customer_reviews.title: Love this boots
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair, because they grow out of them, I have purchased for my 6 year old twins.. These boots are fantastic. They keep their feet warm, dry and are easy for them to put on. They are not heavy or clunky marking it easy for them to run and play in, wearing them through the Spring, Fall, Winter (COLD midwest winters). Great Price!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: nice muck boot
customer_reviews.text: My boy has used these muck boots a lot already after receiving them for Christmas. He likes them b/c they are easy to put on and clean up easily. It has been very muddy this January and these have been his go-to. He does say they are kind of heavy but that has not deterred him from wearing them while playing outside.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Trapnell

product_meta.title: OAKI Kid's Neoprene Rain Boots, Snow Boots, Muck Boots
feature_bullets: COMPREHENSIVE WARRANTY & FREE RETURNS. OAKI stands by its products with a comprehensive 12-month warranty. You can have peace of mind when purchasing OAKI Neoprene boots.

INDUSTRY LEADER: OAKI has been manufacturing neoprene boots for over a decade. The result is the most durable, warm, and comfortable neoprene boot on the market. Our proprietary OAKI vegan ox-tendon sole will outlast our competitors and ensure the least amount of heel or tread ware. Our 7mm thick neoprene is comfort rated to -36 degrees C. OAKI neoprene boots will outlast our competitors' boots, all while offered at a more affordable price.

SLIP RESISTANT LEATHER ALTERNATIVE: OAKI’s neoprene boots are designed to keep up with your child’s active, adventurous side. With our proprietary sole these boots help to grip wet surfaces, minimizing slips and falls.

EASY CLEANING & CARE: OAKI children’s neoprene boots are ideal for rain, snow, and muck. OAKI neoprene boots are simple when it comes to cleaning and care. Simply spray or wipe off these durable boots in order to clean them. The minimal care required and durability of these boots means you can spend more time with your child.

INSULATED FOOT & ANKLE PROTECTION: OAKI’s neoprene boots are made with your child's outdoor adventures in mind. Whether your child is hiking in the mountains and timberlands, or just playing in the backyard, these waterproof boots work to protect your child’s feet and provide an extra layer of insulation for added warmth and comfort in all conditions
